medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse dull periumbilical discomfort and bloating, which evolved into sharp focal pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ).
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms began on ___ while on vacation, starting with diffuse dull periumbilical discomfort and bloating. The discomfort gradually worsened and converted to sharp focal pain in the RLQ by the afternoon of ___. The pain was described as unbearable, causing her to double over, and she experienced nausea and vomiting twice. She has been unable to eat since breakfast on ___.
